parameters.name: Points
parameters.description: Array of IVertex es or ISketchPoint s

title: ISecondaryMemberUpToMembersFeatureData.SetPointMemberPairs
description: Sets the point-member pair(s) used to create one or more secondary structure system up-to members.
signature:
System.Boolean SetPointMemberPairs( 
   System.Object
Points
,
   System.Object
Members
)

parameters.name: Points
parameters.description: Array of IVertex es or ISketchPoint s

remarks:
Points and Members arrays must be ordered to create point-member pairs.
This method is valid only if
ISecondaryMemberUpToMembersFeatureData::MemberPointParametersType
is set to
swSecondaryMemberUpToMembersMemberPointParameters_e
.swSecondaryMemberUpToMembersMemberPointParameters_PointMemberPair.
